price: И он позва у помоћ свога Господара: „Ово је, заиста, невернички народ!"
arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fadaʿā rabbahu anna hāulāi qawmun muj'rimūna
